chart_description: This chart represents the amount of time that the CPU is unable to execute any application due to a delay in some external factors, such as memory access, I/O operations, or network activity. It is a measure of system pressure on CPU operation.

dimension_descriptions.some 10: This dimension represents the amount of time, in milliseconds, during which the CPU experienced some pressure stall time for the past 10 seconds.
dimension_descriptions.some 300: This dimension represents the amount of time, in milliseconds, during which the CPU experienced some pressure stall time for the past 5 minutes.
dimension_descriptions.some 60: This dimension represents the amount of time, in milliseconds, during which the CPU experienced some pressure stall time for the past minute.
